h3. Actor Templates

{{datatables_use}}
{{actortemplates ayspath:$$ayspath}}

{{breadcrumb:
    - AYS81 : /
    {% if aysrepo %}
    - Repo ${reponame}: /ays81/Repo?repopath=$$ayspath&repo=${reponame}
    {% endif %}
    - Actor Templates: /ays81/Actortemplates

}}
{{actions:
{% if  aysrepo %}
- display: Update Templates
  action: /restmachine/system/atyourservice/templatesUpdate
  hide: false
  showresponse: true
  input:
    - name: repo
      value: ${reponame}
      type: hidden
{%else%}
- display: Update Templates
  action: /restmachine/system/atyourservice/templatesUpdate
  hide: false
  showresponse: true
{% endif %}
}}
{% if error is defined %}
    Error : ${error}
{%else%}
    ||Role||Name||Path||Actions||
    {% for template in templates -%}
    | ${template.role} | [${template.name}|ays81/ActorTemplate?aysname=${template.name}&ayspath=$$ayspath] | ${template.path} | {{action label:'Delete' deleterow:true id:'action-Deletetemplate' class:'glyphicon glyphicon-trash' data-repository:'${template['repository']}' data-role:'${template['role']}' data-instance:'${template['instance']}'}} |
    {% endfor %}
{%endif%}
